recipe.title: Zucchini with Cilantro and Cream
ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds zucchini, trimmed, cut into 1/3-inch-thick rounds
instructions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté 10 seconds. Add zucchini and 2 tablespoons cilantro; sauté until zucchini is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Add cream and simmer until juices thicken slightly, about 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper; sprinkle with 2 tablespoons cilantro.
